oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Photograph, Sgt. John D. Dickson and friends at Ft. Oglethorpe, GA
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Sgt. John D. Dickson, Co. B, 54th Inf. Regt., and five friends posed on a cannon at Ft. Oglethorpe, Ga. All are in shirt sleeve order with campaign hats. Working as a rancher in Montana when the war began, he returned home to Chicago to enlist. The photograph has a heavy crease running from center lower edge to center left edge,
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Dickson, John D.
